channel.title: BBC Sport - Formula 1 AV
channel.description: The latest stories from the Formula 1 AV section of the BBC Sport web site.
channel.copyright: Copyright: (C) British Broadcasting Corporation, see http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/help/rss/4498287.stm for terms and conditions of reuse.

item.title: VIDEO: Highlights: Hamilton beats Vettel to pole
item.description: Mercedes' Lewis Hamilton pips Red Bull's Sebastian Vettel to pole position in a wet qualifying session at the Malaysian GP.

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton 'proud' to match GB record
item.description: Mercedes' Lewis Hamilton says he wants to convert poles into wins after qualifying fastest at the Malaysian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Pole was there for the taking - Vettel
item.description: Red Bull's Sebastian Vettel believes pole position was there for the taking despite only qualifying second fastest for the Malaysian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton's pole lap in Malaysia rain
item.description: Lewis Hamilton grabs his second successive pole for Mercedes in qualifying in the rain at the Malaysian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Rain hits Malaysian Grand Prix
item.description: Heavy rain brought disruption to qualifying at Sepang on Saturday, can we expect more of the same on Sunday? Elizabeth Saary takes a look.

item.title: VIDEO: Webber: Getting cooked in an F1 car
item.description: Former Formula 1 driver Mark Webber shows how he used to prepare for racing in extreme heat and humidity to prevent him "getting cooked in the car".

item.title: VIDEO: Dramatic crash ends Ericsson's wet debut
item.description: Caterham's Marcus Ericsson gets out of shape on the exit of Turn Three and runs onto the grass, before clattering into the barrier and spinning across the track.

item.title: VIDEO: Everything you need to know on Sepang
item.description: BBC Sport assesses what makes the Sepang International Circuit, home of the Malaysian Grand Prix, so special.

item.title: VIDEO: 'Professor Rosberg' explains F1 turbos
item.description: Mercedes driver Nico Rosberg explains the physics of Formula 1's new turbo engines to BBC Sport's Lee McKenzie.

item.title: VIDEO: Rosberg fastest in second practice
item.description: Watch highlights as Mercedes driver Nico Rosberg beats Ferrari's Kimi Raikkonen to set the fastest time in second practice at the Malaysian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: The pill that takes drivers' temperature
item.description: Mark Webber meets Dr Simon Sostaric to talk about the pill that drivers take to measure their core temperature during hot Formula 1 races.

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton sets pace in first practice
item.description: Watch highlights as Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton sets the pace from Ferrari's Kimi Raikkonen during first practice at the Malaysian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Sepang tough circuit for McLaren - Button
item.description: Jenson Button is hopeful McLaren will keep improving this weekend in Sepang but plays down his chances of being able to win this weekend's Malaysian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Malaysian F1 Grand Prix
item.description: From qualifying to race day, Ian Fergusson takes a look at the weather prospects in Sepang this weekend.

item.title: VIDEO: Webber & Vettel do battle in Malaysia
item.description: Red Bull's Sebastian Vettel ignores team orders as he battles with team-mate Mark Webber for the lead of the 2013 Malaysian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Highlights: Vettel wins in Malaysia
item.description: Watch race highlights as Red Bull's Sebastian Vettel ignores team orders and overtakes his team-mate Mark Webber to win the Malaysian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Coulthard swaps pit lane for cockpit
item.description: BBC F1 co-commentator David Coulthard swaps the pit lane for the cock pit as he takes a ride in a Royal Australian Air Force jet.

item.title: VIDEO: Classic F1 - Malaysia 2009
item.description: Jenson Button wins the Malaysian Grand Prix as the race is abandoned because of heavy rain. (UK users only)

item.title: VIDEO: BBC pundits on Ricciardo exclusion
item.description: David Coulthard and Allan McNish on the exclusion of Red Bull's Daniel Ricciardo from the Australian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Horner surprised by Ricciardo exclusion
item.description: Red Bull team principal Christian Horner says his team will appeal after Daniel Ricciardo was excluded from the Australian Grand Prix after breaching fuel consumption rules.

item.title: VIDEO: Mercedes speed is cool - Rosberg
item.description: Nico Rosberg says driving a "dominant" car for the first time in his F1 career is "so cool" after winning the Australian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton & Vettel explain retirements
item.description: Lewis Hamilton and Sebastian Vettel explain their unfortunate starts to the Formula 1 season after they were both forced to retire early on during the season-opening Australian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Formula 1 2014: Sculpted from scratch
item.description: Idris Elba narrates BBC Sport's opening sequence for the 2014 Formula 1 season which sees the sport go back to the drawing board and start from scratch.

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton stopped by security in pits
item.description: Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton is stopped by a security guard as he makes his way to the pits at the Australian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: F1's spectacular season openers
item.description: BBC Sport looks back at some of Formula 1's most spectacular opening races as the start of the 2014 season approaches.

item.title: VIDEO: F1 preview: Who has best driver line-up?
item.description: Suzi Perry is joined by David Coulthard, Ben Edwards and Allan McNish to discuss a whole range of topics ahead of the new Formula 1 season.

item.title: VIDEO: F1 preview: 'Ugly' cars & double points
item.description: Suzi Perry is joined by David Coulthard, Ben Edwards and Allan McNish to discuss a whole range of topics ahead of the new Formula 1 season.

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton or Button 'can win title'
item.description: Suzi Perry is joined by David Coulthard, Ben Edwards and Allan McNish to discuss Lewis Hamilton and Jenson Button's title hopes in the new Formula 1 season.

item.title: VIDEO: F1: Driver wars & comeback kids
item.description: Suzi Perry is joined by David Coulthard, Ben Edwards and Allan McNish to discuss a whole range of topics ahead of the new Formula 1 season.

item.title: VIDEO: The best & worst of Raikkonen at Ferrari
item.description: BBC Sport looks back at Kimi Raikkonen's previous spell at Ferrari, as he prepares to start his first season back with the team.

item.title: VIDEO: Highlights: Rosberg wins in Australia
item.description: Watch highlights as Nico Rosberg delivers on Mercedes' promise as favourites, with a dominant victory in the season-opening Australian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: McNish explains 2014 rule changes
item.description: BBC Sport's Allan McNish explains Formula 1's "biggest rule change in a generation".

item.title: VIDEO: Inside F1 - Australian GP qualifying
item.description: BBC Sport's Lee McKenzie and David Coulthard are joined by Red Bull Racing's Christian Horner to discuss a thrilling Australian Grand Prix qualifying session.

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton describes 'incredible' pole lap
item.description: Lewis Hamilton describes his "incredible feeling" after claiming pole position in a thrilling wet qualifying session for the Australian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Vettel booed after early Australia exit
item.description: Sebastian Vettel is booed by the Australian Grand Prix crowd after suffering an early exit from a wet qualifying session at Melbourne's Albert Park.

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton quickest in Australia qualifying
item.description: Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton steals a last-ditch pole position in a thrilling wet qualifying session at the Australian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Ricciardo & rookies shine in qualifying
item.description: Red Bull Racing's Daniel Ricciardo says taking second place for the season-opening Australian Grand Prix is "by far" his best qualifying session to date in Formula 1.

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton upbeat after 'difficult day'
item.description: Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton says it was a "difficult day" after Friday's practice sessions for the Australian Grand Prix, but he feels "positive" about a strong race.

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton sets pace in practice two
item.description: Watch highlights as Lewis Hamilton heads Nico Rosberg to a Mercedes one-two in second practice at the season-opening Australian GP.

item.title: VIDEO: F1 drivers on the season opener
item.description: F1 drivers including Lewis Hamilton, Sebastian Vettel & Jenson Button look ahead to the season-opening Australian Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Alonso surprise fastest in P1
item.description: Ferrari's Fernando Alonso is fastest in the first practice for the Australian GP in Melbourne, while Lewis Hamilton breaks down on his first lap.

item.title: VIDEO: Inside F1: Australian GP practice
item.description: Lee McKenzie is joined by Allan McNish for Inside F1 as they review Friday's practice sessions and look ahead to what the season-opener in Australia might bring.

item.title: VIDEO: F1 - What makes Australia so special?
item.description: BBC Sport looks back at some of the Australian Grand Prix's most exciting moments.

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton 'more fired-up than ever'
item.description: Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton says he's 'more fired-up than ever' ahead of the 2014 Formula 1 season opener in Melbourne, Australia.

item.title: VIDEO: F1 preview: What has testing taught us?
item.description: Suzi Perry is joined by David Coulthard, Ben Edwards and Allan McNish to discuss a whole range of topics ahead of the new Formula 1 season.

item.title: VIDEO: F1 testing final day round-up
item.description: BBC Sport's Tom Clarkson reports on the final day of pre-season testing in Bahrain, where Mercedes' Lewis Hamilton set the pace.

item.title: VIDEO: Vettel in a spin in Bahrain test
item.description: Red Bull's Sebastian Vettel spins off the track to bring out a red flag during day four of Formula 1 testing in Bahrain.

item.title: VIDEO: Red Bull test problems continue
item.description: Red Bull's problems ahead of the new Formula 1 season continue on day three of testing in Bahrain.

item.title: VIDEO: Red Bull on back foot - Horner
item.description: Team Principal Christian Horner admits Red Bull Racing are "on the back foot" but says he is "confident" of resolving their reliability problems ahead of the first race in Melbourne.

item.title: VIDEO: F1 testing summary - Bahrain day two
item.description: Lewis Hamilton, Jenson Button and Fernando Alonso review day two of the final pre-season test in Bahrain.

item.title: VIDEO: Two or three stops per race - Pirelli
item.description: Pirelli's Paul Hembery believes Formula 1 cars will make "two or three stops" during races in 2014 after analysing data from the latest test in Bahrain.

item.title: VIDEO: 2014 season will be challenging - Alonso
item.description: BBC Sport's Jennie Gow reports from day two of the second pre-season test in Bahrain.

item.title: VIDEO: Button 'excited' by new F1 season
item.description: BBC Sport's Jennie Gow reports from day three of the second pre-season test in Bahrain.

item.title: VIDEO: Best work of the winter - Ricciardo
item.description: Red Bull's Daniel Ricciardo says that day one of the final pre-season test in Bahrain was his team's "best work of the winter".

item.title: VIDEO: Winners & losers from Bahrain test
item.description: BBC Sport's Jennie Gow reports on who the winners and losers have been from the second pre-season test in Bahrain.

item.title: VIDEO: Behind-the-scenes at Bahrain F1 test
item.description: BBC Sport's Jennie Gow goes behind-the-scenes at the second Formula 1 pre-season test in Bahrain.

item.title: VIDEO: Vettel breaks down during testing
item.description: Sebastian Vettel's Red Bull stops on the track during pre-season testing in Bahrain.

item.title: VIDEO: Ecclestone 'relieved' as F1 case ends
item.description: Formula 1 boss Bernie Ecclestone says he is "relieved" after a judge rejected an Â£85m damages claim against him over a sale of F1 shares.

item.title: VIDEO: Pat Symonds on complex 2014 cars
item.description: Williams's chief technical officer Pat Symonds says getting used to the new 2014 technical specifications in F1 has been "character building".

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton satisfied with Bahrain testing
item.description: BBC Sport's Jennie Gow reports from day one of the second pre-season test in Bahrain.

item.title: VIDEO: Lotus reveal new F1 car in Bahrain
item.description: Lotus become the final team to run their 2014 Formula 1 car in public, in the second pre-season test in Bahrain.

item.title: VIDEO: Winners & losers from Jerez testing
item.description: BBC F1 commentator Ben Edwards gives his thoughts on the winners and losers from the first Formula 1 winter test in Jerez.

item.title: VIDEO: Latest from F1 winter testing
item.description: BBC Sport's Lee McKenzie and Ben Edwards bring the latest from the third day of pre-season F1 testing in Jerez.

item.title: VIDEO: New-look F1 cars take to the track
item.description: BBC Sport's Lee McKenzie and Ben Edwards assess the first Formula 1 test of the season as the team's cars go on track for the first time.

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton 'heart in mouth' after crash
item.description: Lewis Hamilton says it was a "great feeling to get back in the car" after the first day of testing for the 2014 Formula 1 season.

item.title: VIDEO: A guide to F1's 2014 rule changes
item.description: BBC Sport's Tom Clarkson guides us through the rule changes that come into force in the 2014 Formula 1 season.

item.title: VIDEO: Formula 1: The best moments of 2013
item.description: BBC Sport takes a look back at some of the most memorable moments of the 2013 Formula 1 season.

item.title: VIDEO: Formula 1's best overtakes of 2013
item.description: BBC Sport looks back at some of the most exciting overtaking manoeuvres from the 2013 Formula 1 season.

item.title: VIDEO: 2014 is time to deliver - Alonso
item.description: Fernando Alonso says it is "time to deliver" for Ferrari in 2014 and believes he is in "the best team to win next year".

item.title: VIDEO: New F1 regulations 'will help Vettel'
item.description: Mark Webber says Formula 1's new regulations in 2014 will be "perfect" for four-time world champion Sebastian Vettel to continue his dominance of the sport.

item.title: VIDEO: The 2013 F1 season's closing credits
item.description: Public Service Broadcasting play out the 2013 Formula 1 season's credits on the BBC.

item.title: VIDEO: Best action from Vettel's amazing year
item.description: BBC Sport tells the story of Sebastian Vettel's journey to the 2013 Formula 1 world championship title.

item.title: VIDEO: Watch Hamilton fly with Red Arrows
item.description: Watch Lewis Hamilton team up with the Red Arrows, as he fulfils a lifelong ambition to fly with the famous aerobatic team.

item.title: VIDEO: McLaren veterans race classic cars
item.description: Former McLaren team-mates David Coulthard and Mika Hakkinen reunite to race some of the team's iconic cars.

item.title: VIDEO: Button drives F1 car in home town
item.description: Thousands of people turned out to see the Formula 1 driving ace Jenson Button drive his McLaren though his home town.

item.title: VIDEO: Hamilton meets Sir Stirling Moss
item.description: Former Mercedes driver Stirling Moss says that Lewis Hamilton can win the world championship as long as his former team provide him with a competitive car.

item.title: VIDEO: Vettel mimics Raikkonen radio rant
item.description: Sebastian Vettel mimics Kimi Raikkonen's amusing radio messages of 12 months earlier after winning the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix.

item.title: VIDEO: Vettel wins overseas Sports Personality
item.description: Sebastian Vettel wins the BBC Overseas Sports Personality of the Year after winning his fourth successive Formula 1 World Championship.
